quests.name: Cross-breeding
quests.description: You've been selected for a grant program in the USA to cross-breed corn. Maybe something could come of this?
quests.success: Success! Your new corn has 10% lower water usage.
quests.failure: What a waste! Your corn breed used 10% less water, but it lost its glyphosate resistance. In your shame, you loaded it all up in a biomass reactor and destroyed the evidence.

quests.name: Cross-breeding
quests.description: Time to put your new corn into action! Solve Canada's food insecurity problem once and for all
quests.success: Success! You were able to introduce new, lower cost calories to many urban centers.
quests.failure: Oh no! Your trial farmers had a flood that wiped out half the growing season's crops. Your new corn was more expensive than the competition this year.

quests.name: Press conference
quests.description: Your conscience has grown heavy recently. You want to commandeer your next press conference in support of food security
quests.success: Success! People really seemed to connect with your message.
quests.failure: Failure! You really need to stop going to press conferences drunk.

quests.name: Local election
quests.description: Your province is up for a special election! Put food on the table this year!
quests.success: Success! You are now Treasurer for the provincial school board. You are able to fund reduced cost school lunches.
quests.failure: Failure! If you want to keep running for office you need to stop disputing the election results.
